title.rendered: Tastebudz Critical Banana Smoothie Autoflower Seeds

content.rendered:
🍌 Critical Banana Smoothie Auto Strain – by Tastebudz Syndicate

A Tropical Indica Escape with Fast Results and Rich Flavour

The Critical Banana Smoothie Auto strain by Tastebudz Syndicate blends the fruity sweetness of Banana Punch with the fast, robust characteristics of Critical genetics. This Autoflowering indica hybrid is designed for seed collectors who value tropical terpenes, soothing effects, and a reliable flowering cycle. Whether you’re expanding your collection or looking for your next go-to, this creamy classic delivers serious satisfaction.

Looking for the photoperiod version? Click here to check out Critical Banana Smoothie Feminized →

📊 Critical Banana Smoothie Auto Strain Specs

Feature Details
Genetics Banana Punch x Critical (Auto)
Strain Type 70% Indica / 30% Sativa
THC Content Up to 25% THC
Flowering Time 8–9 Weeks (Autoflowering)
Indoor Yield Up to 550g/m²
Outdoor Yield 120–200g/plant
Flavours Creamy banana, tropical fruits, Pina Colada
Aromas Sweet, fruity, citrus, tropical smoothie
Effects Calming, euphoric, body-focused

🌟 Why Choose Critical Banana Smoothie Auto?

🍌 Rare tropical banana profile with creamy coconut undertones rarely found in autoflowers
🧬 Stable, resilient genetics ideal for variable climates or space-limited setups
🔬 Rich in unique terpenes like Alpha Terpineol & Beta Caryophyllene for an extra smooth aroma
🌿 Tight internodal spacing and dense bud structure make this a standout in any seed collection
🍹 A popular pick among flavour-chasers and sweet strain enthusiasts
🎁 Includes exclusive Tastebudz auto genetics not available in any mix pack
📖 Featured in our 2024 blog: Best-Yielding Cannabis Strains →
🔗 Prefer photoperiod? Explore Critical Banana Smoothie Feminized

🍌 Flavour & Aroma of Critical Banana Smoothie Auto

This strain is like a tropical cocktail in seed form. Expect notes of ripe banana, zesty citrus, and a creamy coconut finish, evoking a smoothie straight from a beachside bar. Its dessert-like aroma fills the room with fruity sweetness and a hint of exotic fuel, making it irresistible from first grind to final puff.

💥 Potency & Effects

The Critical Banana Smoothie Auto strain delivers up to 25% THC, offering a deeply relaxing full-body buzz that soothes without sedation. Perfect for unwinding after a long day, sparking mellow creativity, or simply adding a sweet, euphoric touch to your evening routine.

📝 Key Terpenes

  • Alpha-Pinene
  • Linalool
  • D-Limonene
  • Beta Caryophyllene
  • Alpha Terpineol

These contribute to the strain’s vibrant tropical fruit and herbal-citrus aroma while enhancing its deeply relaxing yet mentally clear effects.

❓ Frequently Asked Questions

1. What kind of flavour does Critical Banana Smoothie Auto have?
Expect banana-forward sweetness with creamy tropical undertones — like a fruity cocktail with a kushy twist.

2. Is this strain suitable for beginners?
Yes, it’s a great choice for all experience levels due to its compact size, resilience, and fast flowering cycle.

3. What are the effects of this strain?
Mellow, soothing, and euphoric — perfect for winding down or boosting your mood after a busy day.

4. What is the yield like?
Indoors, up to 550g/m²; outdoors, 120–200g/plant in optimal conditions.

5. Is there a photoperiod version of Critical Banana Smoothie?
Yes — check out the original photoperiod version here →

📜 Legal Note

Tastebudz Syndicate seeds are sold strictly as souvenirs in accordance with UK law. Germination or cultivation is illegal in the UK without a government-issued license. Please check your local laws before placing an order.

excerpt.rendered:
Critical Banana Smoothie Auto is a potent 25% THC indica-leaning hybrid from Tastebudz Syndicate, bursting with creamy banana flavour and sweet tropical terpenes. Quick to finish, fruity, and smooth — it’s a standout autoflower for flavour lovers.

🍌 Creamy Banana x Pina Colada Flavour
⚡ 8–9 Week Seed-to-Harvest Time
🧬 Resilient Indica-Dominant Hybrid
✅ 100% Autoflowering Feminized Seeds
🌱 Free seeds with every order
📦 Free UK shipping on all orders over £50
✈️ Tracked USA shipping direct from our team
